title: Payment Instrument
description: The base definition for any payment instrument. It links the instrument to a specific payment handler.

id.description: A unique identifier for this instrument instance, assigned by the platform.

handler_id.description: The unique identifier for the handler instance that produced this instrument. This corresponds to the 'id' field in the Payment Handler definition.

type.description: The broad category of the instrument (e.g., 'card', 'tokenized_card'). Specific schemas will constrain this to a constant value.

billing_address.description: The billing address associated with this payment method.

display.description: Display information for this payment instrument. Each payment instrument schema defines its specific display properties, as outlined by the payment handler.

selected_payment_instrument.title: Selected Payment Instrument
selected_payment_instrument.description: A payment instrument with selection state.

selected.description: Whether this instrument is selected by the user.
